/>
XI.iii.1.D.3.d
.
Government Headstone or Marker for Deaths on or After November 1, 1990
Under
PL 110-157
, which amends
PL 107-330
, government headstones or markers may also be furnished if the Veteran died on or after November 1, 1990, regardless of whether the grave is already marked with a headstone or marker purchased at private expense.
title: M21-1, Part XI, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section D  - Memorialization
citation: Part XI, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section D
